issue.title: snlookup.com
issue.body:

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Anti Adblock Script) [https://empire-stream.net/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fempire-stream.net%2F) ### Comment > To play a video you have to pass a adwall. When you click on the video and choose ad option, a window tell you to disable the adblocker. > > It would be great if you can completely remove the adwall / paywall. Thanks a lot.
